languages.text: "Абсолютно верно. Переговоры с выродками невозможны, остается лишь путь уничтожения. И начать стоит с верхушки. Надлежит ли нам атаковать решительно и быстро, либо ввести в столицу технику, выдав себя, но получив превосходство в огневой мощи? Устранять их верхушку тихо или бить по площадям, гарантированно зачищая пораженные инфекцией территории".

traits.locale_text: "Абсолютно верно. Переговоры с выродками невозможны, остается лишь путь уничтожения. И начать стоит с верхушки. Надлежит ли нам атаковать решительно и быстро, либо ввести в столицу технику, выдав себя, но получив превосходство в огневой мощи? Устранять их верхушку тихо или бить по площадям, гарантированно зачищая пораженные инфекцией территории".

languages.text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"
languages.original_text: "Абсолютно верно. Переговоры с выродками невозможны, остается лишь путь уничтожения. И начать стоит с верхушки. Надлежит ли нам атаковать решительно и быстро, либо ввести в столицу технику, выдав себя, но получив превосходство в огневой мощи? Устранять их верхушку тихо или бить по площадям, гарантировано зачищая пораженные инфекцией территории".

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates, and our only option is to completely destroy them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we expose ourselves by bringing the heavy machinery into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? To quietly eliminate their leaders or hit the areas to cleanse the infected territories?"

"Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates, and our only option is to completely destroy them. We should start from the top. "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

languages.text: “您说得一点都没错。与那些堕落生物谈判是不可能的事情，我们唯一的选择就是彻底消灭他们。既然如此，我们是应该果断而迅速地发起突袭？还是直接全副武装，命令重型战争器械进入首都，提供火力优势？我们是应该悄无声息地暗杀掉他们的领导人？还是直接向受感染的地区倾泻火力，清除叛徒？”
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: “您说得一点都没错。与那些堕落生物谈判是不可能的事情，我们唯一的选择就是彻底消灭他们。既然如此，我们是应该果断而迅速地发起突袭？还是直接全副武装，命令重型战争器械进入首都，提供火力优势？我们是应该悄无声息地暗杀掉他们的领导人？还是直接向受感染的地区倾泻火力，清除叛徒？”
“您说得一点都没错。与那些堕落生物谈判是不可能的事情，我们唯一的选择就是彻底消灭他们。既然如此，我们是应该果断而迅速地发起突袭？还是冒着暴露自己的风险，将重武器带进首都，以获得火力优势？是悄无声息地暗杀掉他们的领导人？还是直接打击受感染的地区，清除叛徒？”

languages.text: «Toda la razón. Es imposible negociar con las abominaciones. Nuestra única opción es aniquilarlas por completo, empezando desde arriba. ¿Atacamos con decisión y rapidez o revelamos que los hemos descubierto enviando vehículos de asalto a la capital como refuerzo? ¿Eliminamos sutilmente a sus líderes o arrasamos los territorios infectados y purgamos a los traidores?».
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: «Toda la razón. Es imposible negociar con las abominaciones. Nuestra única opción es aniquilarlas por completo, empezando desde arriba. ¿Atacamos con decisión y rapidez o revelamos que los hemos descubierto enviando vehículos de asalto a la capital como refuerzo? ¿Eliminamos sutilmente a sus líderes o arrasamos los territorios infectados y purgamos a los traidores?».

languages.text: 「まったくその通り。堕落者と交渉するのは不可能だ。唯一の選択肢は、彼らを完全に消滅させることだ。始めるならトップからだ。断固とした態度で、かつ迅速に攻撃を仕掛けるべきか、それとも大砲を首都に持ち込んで存在感を示し、破壊力の優位性を利用すべきだろうか？音もなく奴らのリーダーたちを排除するのか、それとも感染した領域を攻撃して反逆者を一掃しようか？」
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: 「まったくその通り。堕落者と交渉するのは不可能だ。唯一の選択肢は、彼らを完全に消滅させることだ。始めるならトップからだ。断固とした態度で、かつ迅速に攻撃を仕掛けるべきか、それとも大砲を首都に持ち込んで存在感を示し、破壊力の優位性を利用すべきだろうか？音もなく奴らのリーダーたちを排除するのか、それとも感染した領域を攻撃して反逆者を一掃しようか？」
「まったくその通り。堕落者と交渉するのは不可能だ。唯一の選択肢は、彼らを完全に消滅させることだ。始めるならトップからだ。断固とした態度で、かつ迅速に攻撃を仕掛けるべきか、それとも大砲を首都に持ち込んで存在感を示し、破壊力の優位性を利用すべきだろうか？音もなく奴らのリーダーたちを排除するのか、それとも感染した領域を攻撃して反逆者を一掃しようか？」

languages.text: « Je suis bien d'accord. Il est totalement impossible de négocier avec ces dégénérés. Nous n'avons d'autre choix que de les éradiquer et, pour cela, il faut commencer par viser la tête. Vaut-il mieux frapper vite et fort, ou dévoiler nos intentions en amenant nos véhicules d'assaut dans la capitale pour asseoir notre supériorité militaire ? Éliminer discrètement leurs chefs ou attaquer les territoires infectés et en éliminer les traîtres ? »
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis bien d'accord. Il est totalement impossible de négocier avec ces dégénérés. Nous n'avons d'autre choix que de les éradiquer et, pour cela, il faut commencer par viser la tête. Vaut-il mieux frapper vite et fort, ou dévoiler nos intentions en amenant nos véhicules d'assaut dans la capitale pour asseoir notre supériorité militaire ? Éliminer discrètement leurs chefs ou attaquer les territoires infectés et en éliminer les traîtres ? »

languages.text: "Vollkommen richtig. Es ist unmöglich, mit den Degenerierten zu verhandeln. Unsere einzige Option ist ihre vollständige Auslöschung. Wir sollten von oben anfangen. Sollen wir entschlossen und schnell angreifen oder unsere Trümpfe aufdecken, indem wir Angriffsfahrzeuge in die Hauptstadt verlegen, um uns einen Vorteil hinsichtlich unserer Feuerkraft zu verschaffen? Schalten wir ihre Anführer lautlos aus oder vernichten wir die infizierten Gebiete, um sie von Verrätern zu säubern?"
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: "Vollkommen richtig. Es ist unmöglich, mit den Degenerierten zu verhandeln. Unsere einzige Option ist ihre vollständige Auslöschung. Wir sollten von oben anfangen. Sollen wir entschlossen und schnell angreifen oder unsere Trümpfe aufdecken, indem wir Angriffsfahrzeuge in die Hauptstadt verlegen, um uns einen Vorteil hinsichtlich unserer Feuerkraft zu verschaffen? Schalten wir ihre Anführer lautlos aus oder vernichten wir die infizierten Gebiete, um sie von Verrätern zu säubern?"

"Vollkommen richtig. Es ist unmöglich, mit den Degenerierten zu verhandeln. Unsere einzige Option ist es, sie vollständig auszulöschen. Wir sollten von oben anfangen. Sollen wir entschlossen und schnell angreifen oder sollen wir ein Risiko eingehen und unsere schweren Waffen in die Hauptstadt bringen, um uns einen Vorteil bei der Feuerkraft zu verschaffen? Die Anführer leise eliminieren oder die befallenen Gebiete attackieren und von Verrätern befreien?"

languages.text: "Kesinlikle doğru. Soysuzlarla müzakere etmek mümkün değil. Tek seçeneğimiz, onları tamamen ortadan kaldırmak. En tepeden başlamalıyız. Harekete kararlı ve hızlı bir şekilde mi geçmeliyiz yoksa saldırı araçlarımızı başkente getirip ateş gücü avantajı yakalayarak kendimizi açığa mı çıkarmalıyız? Liderlerini sessizce ortadan kaldıracak mıyız yoksa etkilenen bölgeleri yıkıma uğratıp hainlerden temizleyecek miyiz?"
languages.original_text: "Absolutely right. It is impossible to negotiate with the degenerates. Our only option is to completely annihilate them. We should start from the top. Should we attack decisively and quickly, or should we show our hand by bringing assault vehicles into the capital and gain an advantage in firepower? Do we quietly eliminate their leaders, or do we rain destruction upon the infected territories and cleanse them of traitors?"

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle doğru. Soysuzlarla müzakere etmek mümkün değil. Tek seçeneğimiz, onları tamamen ortadan kaldırmak. En tepeden başlamalıyız. Harekete kararlı ve hızlı bir şekilde mi geçmeliyiz yoksa saldırı araçlarımızı başkente getirip ateş gücü avantajı yakalayarak kendimizi açığa mı çıkarmalıyız? Liderlerini sessizce ortadan kaldıracak mıyız yoksa etkilenen bölgeleri yıkıma uğratıp hainlerden temizleyecek miyiz?"
